casebody.data:
August J. CONIGLIARO and Salvatore Conigliaro, Plaintiffs in Error, v. UNITED STATES, Defendant in Error. (Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. April 24, 1925.) No. 254. Nicholas Selvaggi, of New York City (Harry G. Anderson, of New York City, of counsel), for plaintiffs in error. Emory R. Buckner, U. S. Atty., of New York City (John M. Cashin, Special Asst. U. S. Atty., of New York City, of counsel), for the United States.

Before HOUGH, MANTON, and HAND, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Judgment affirmed..
